#include "../deptran/__dep__.h"
#include "server.h"
#include "../deptran/raft/server.h"
#include "client.h"

namespace janus {

int64_t ShardKvServer::GetNextOpId() {
  verify(sp_log_svr_);
  int64_t ret = sp_log_svr_->site_id_;
  ret = ret << 32;
  ret = ret + op_id_cnt_++; 
  return ret;
}

#define KV_TIMEOUT_TIME 5000000

int ShardKvServer::Put(const uint64_t& oid, 
                  const string& k,
                  const string& v) {
    // lab_shard: fill in your code
    uint64_t myOid = oid;

    RaftServer& raftServer = GetRaftServer();
    bool is_leader;
    uint64_t term;

    Log_debug("[%d] Received PUT %d", raftServer.site_id_, myOid);

    raftServer.GetState(&is_leader, &term);
    if(!is_leader) {
      Log_debug("[%d] Received PUT %d but I'm not a leader", raftServer.site_id_, myOid);
      return KV_NOTLEADER;
    }

    int currOpIndex = opIndex_++;

    auto s = make_shared<MultiStringMarshallable>();
    s->data_.push_back(to_string(myOid));
    s->data_.push_back(to_string(currOpIndex));
    s->data_.push_back("put");
    s->data_.push_back(k);
    s->data_.push_back(v);

    Log_debug("[%d] send PUT to RAFT %d, %d", raftServer.site_id_, myOid, currOpIndex);

    uint64_t index;
    auto m = dynamic_pointer_cast<Marshallable>(s);
    if (!raftServer.Start(m, &index, &term)) {


      return KV_NOTLEADER;
    }
    // block here for onNextCommand
    auto ev = Reactor::CreateSpEvent<IntEvent>();
    {
      lock_guard<mutex> lg(event_mutex_);
      event_map_[to_string(currOpIndex)] = ev;
    }

    ev->Wait(KV_TIMEOUT_TIME);

    {
      lock_guard<mutex> lg(event_mutex_);
      event_map_.erase(to_string(currOpIndex));
    }

    if (ev->status_ == Event::DONE) {
      Log_debug("[%d] PUT successful %d", raftServer.site_id_, myOid);
      return KV_SUCCESS;
    }
    Log_debug("[%d] PUT timeout %d", raftServer.site_id_, myOid);
    return KV_TIMEOUT;
  //  });
}

int ShardKvServer::Append(const uint64_t& oid, 
                     const string& k,
                     const string& v) {
    // lab_shard: fill in your code
    uint64_t myOid = oid;

    RaftServer& raftServer = GetRaftServer();
    bool is_leader;
    uint64_t term;

    Log_debug("[%d] Received APPEND %d", raftServer.site_id_, myOid);

    raftServer.GetState(&is_leader, &term);
    if(!is_leader) {
      return KV_NOTLEADER;
    }

    int currOpIndex = opIndex_++;

    auto s = make_shared<MultiStringMarshallable>();
    s->data_.push_back(to_string(myOid));
    s->data_.push_back(to_string(currOpIndex));
    s->data_.push_back("append");
    s->data_.push_back(k);
    s->data_.push_back(v);

    uint64_t index;
    auto m = dynamic_pointer_cast<Marshallable>(s);
    if (!raftServer.Start(m, &index, &term)) {


      return KV_NOTLEADER;
    }
    // block here for onNextCommand
    auto ev = Reactor::CreateSpEvent<IntEvent>();
    {
      lock_guard<mutex> lg(event_mutex_);
      event_map_[to_string(currOpIndex)] = ev;
    }

    ev->Wait(KV_TIMEOUT_TIME);

    {
      lock_guard<mutex> lg(event_mutex_);
      event_map_.erase(to_string(currOpIndex));
    }

    if (ev->status_ == Event::DONE) {
      Log_debug("[%d] APPEND successful %d", raftServer.site_id_, myOid);
      return KV_SUCCESS;
    }
    Log_debug("[%d] APPEND timeout %d", raftServer.site_id_, myOid);
    return KV_TIMEOUT;
}

int ShardKvServer::Get(const uint64_t& oid, 
                  const string& k,
                  string* v) {
    // lab_shard: fill in your code
    uint64_t myOid = oid;
    string key = k;

    RaftServer& raftServer = GetRaftServer();
    bool is_leader;
    uint64_t term;

    Log_debug("[%d] Received GET %d", raftServer.site_id_, myOid);

    raftServer.GetState(&is_leader, &term);
    if(!is_leader) {
      return KV_NOTLEADER;
    }

    int currOpIndex = opIndex_++;

    auto s = make_shared<MultiStringMarshallable>();
    s->data_.push_back(to_string(myOid));
    s->data_.push_back(to_string(currOpIndex));
    s->data_.push_back("get");
    s->data_.push_back(k);

    uint64_t index;
    auto m = dynamic_pointer_cast<Marshallable>(s);
    if (!raftServer.Start(m, &index, &term)) {


      return KV_NOTLEADER;
    }
    // block here for onNextCommand
    auto ev = Reactor::CreateSpEvent<IntEvent>();
    {
      lock_guard<mutex> lg(event_mutex_);
      event_map_[to_string(currOpIndex)] = ev;
    }

    ev->Wait(KV_TIMEOUT_TIME);

    {
      lock_guard<mutex> lg(event_mutex_);
      event_map_.erase(to_string(currOpIndex));
    }

    if (ev->status_ == Event::DONE) {
      lock_guard<mutex> lg(kv_mutex_);
      if (kv_store_.find(key) != kv_store_.end()) {
        string ret;
        for (auto& st: kv_store_[key]) {
          ret += st;
        }
        *v = ret;
      }
      Log_debug("[%d] GET successful %d", raftServer.site_id_, myOid);
      return KV_SUCCESS;
    }
    Log_debug("[%d] GET timeout %d", raftServer.site_id_, myOid);
    return KV_TIMEOUT;
}



void ShardKvServer::OnNextCommand(Marshallable& m) {
    // lab_shard: fill in your code
  auto v = (MultiStringMarshallable*)(&m);
  /* your code here */
  assert(3 <= v->data_.size());
  string oidStr = v->data_.at(0);
  string eventIndexStr = v->data_.at(1);
  string key = v->data_.at(3);

  {
    lock_guard<mutex> lg(kv_mutex_);
    if ("put" == v->data_.at(2)) {
      string value = v->data_.at(4);
      kv_store_[key] = vector<string>{value};
    }
    else if ("append" == v->data_.at(2)) {
      string value = v->data_.at(4);
      if (kv_store_.find(key) != kv_store_.end()) {
        kv_store_[key].push_back(value);
      }
      else {
        kv_store_[key] = vector<string>{value};
      }
    }
    else {
      // get - noop
    }
  }



  RaftServer& raftServer = GetRaftServer();
  bool is_leader;
  uint64_t term;

  raftServer.GetState(&is_leader, &term);
  if(!is_leader) {
    return;
  }

  Log_debug("OnNextCommand:: checking and setting event");

  {
    lock_guard<mutex> lg(event_mutex_);
    auto itr = event_map_.find(eventIndexStr);
    if (itr != event_map_.end()) {
      if(!itr->second->IsTimeout()) {
        itr->second->Set(1);
      }
    }
  }
}

shared_ptr<ShardKvClient> ShardKvServer::CreateClient(Communicator* comm) {
  auto cli = make_shared<ShardKvClient>();
  cli->commo_ = comm;
  verify(cli->commo_ != nullptr);
  static uint32_t id = 0;
  id++;
  cli->cli_id_ = id; 
  return cli;
}

} // namespace janus;
